input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product title below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product title:
Acoustic Research PR190N Component Video 3 pc Red/Blue/Green w/males ends (3 feet) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)

Product features:
24K gold plating
Precision machined 8 segment connectors
Nitrogen injected dielectric
Multi-shielded design
Pure silver coated oxygen-free copper
input_text.Response A: The PR190N is a 3-piece component video cable that features 24K gold plated connectors. This high-end cable is designed to deliver the best possible picture and sound quality. The PR190N is a high-performance component video cable designed for use with HD TVs. It features a pure silver-coated oxygen-free copper core, which provides high signal clarity and resistance to signal interference. The cable is also multi-shielded, which protects the signal from interference. The PR190N comes with precision machined 8- segment connectors, which make it easy to connect to your TV.
input_text.Response B:
Your client wants the product description to be fun and engaging.
This product is perfect for those who love to watch movies or play video games in high definition. The red, blue, and green wires provide a sharp and clear image while the 24k gold plating ensures a long lasting and reliable connection. The precision machined 8 segment connectors add durability and strength, while the nitrogen injected dielectric provides superior insulation. This product is sure to exceed your expectations and provide a great viewing experience.

label_annotations.factors_a: It is factual but does not make the product very engaging - its quite dry and not very 'fun' even though it mentions a few positives of some of the features listed.
label_annotations.factors_b: B is the better answer but is merely adding a positive spin to listing the features and functions of them. It loses points for repeating language from the prompt request "Your client wants the product description to be fun and engaging."
